svcsubproc.title: Driver Side Sliding Window Assembly
svcsubproc.para: The driver side window is an extruded aluminum framed sliding window. An optional driver side storm window is also available. The driver side sliding window assembly is secured in place with 9 mounting screws. To remove the driver window assembly follow the procedures as listed below.

step1.para: Slide the forward section of the driver side window to the rear. Locate the two frame mounting screws on the forward vertical extrusion. Loosen and remove the fasteners.
Locate the two mounting screws on the bottom extrusion of the forward window section. Loosen and remove the mounting screws.

calloutgroup.callout1: DRIVER WINDOW VERTICAL FRAME MOUNTING SCREWS
DRIVER WINDOW LOWER FRAME MOUNTING SCREW
DRIVER WINDOW LOWER FRAME AND WINDOW TRACK

step1.para: Locate the remaining two lower extrusion mounting screws at the rear bottom frame section. Loosen and remove the mounting screws.
Locate the two screws fastening the rear vertical extrusion to the bus structure, loosen and remove.

calloutgroup.callout1: DRIVER WINDOW UPPER FRAME MOUNTING SCREWS
DRIVER WINDOW VERTICAL FRAME MOUNTING SCREWS

step1.para: Locate the three mounting screws along the upper window frame attaching the window to the window header.
Loosen and remove the mounting screws and remove the driver side sliding window assembly.
